nmsq_01.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Dribbling of saliva during the daytime?

nmsq_02.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Loss or change in your ability to taste or smell

nmsq_03.Description: In the past month, have you experienced:  Difficulty swallowing food or drink or problems with choking?

nmsq_04.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Vomiting or feelings of sickness (nausea)?

nmsq_05.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Constipation (less than 3 bowel movements a week) or having to strain to pass a stool (faeces)

nmsq_06.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Bowel (fecal) incontinence

nmsq_07.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Feeling that your bowel emptying is incomplete after having been to the toilet

nmsq_08.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: A sense of urgency to pass urine makes you rush to the toilet

nmsq_09.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Getting up regularly at night to pass urine?

nmsq_10.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Unexplained pains (not due to known conditions such as arthritis)

nmsq_11.Description: In the past month, have you experienced:  Unexplained change in weight (not due to change in diet)

nmsq_12.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Problems remembering things that have happened recently or forgetting to do things?

nmsq_13.Description: In the past month, have you experienced:  Loss of interest in what is happening around you or doing things?

nmsq_14.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Seeing or hearing things that you know or are told are not there?

nmsq_15.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Difficulty concentrating or staying focussed?

nmsq_16.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Feeling sad, ?low? or ?blue??

nmsq_17.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Feeling anxious, frightened or panicky?

nmsq_18.Description: In the past month, have you experienced:  Feeling less interested in sex or more interested in sex?

nmsq_19.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Finding it difficult to have sex when you try?

nmsq_20.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Feeling light headed, dizzy or weak standing from sitting or lying?

nmsq_21.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Falling?

nmsq_22.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Finding it difficult to stay awake during activities such as working, driving or eating?

nmsq_23.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Difficulty getting to sleep at night or staying asleep at night?

nmsq_24.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Intense, vivid dreams or frightening dreams?

nmsq_25.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Talking or moving about in your sleep as if you are acting out a dream?

nmsq_26.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Unpleasant sensations in your legs at night or while resting, and a feeling that you need to move

nmsq_27.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Swelling of your legs?

nmsq_28.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Excessive sweating?

nmsq_29.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Double vision?

nmsq_30.Description: In the past month, have you experienced: Believing things are happening to you that other people say are not true?
